text: dawis-iyeo uliga neoleul jisang ui daelijaloseo dueossgeoneul salamdeul-euljinliwa jeong-uilo pangyeolhala geuligo ne ma-eum-ui yogmang-eul ttaleuji malla geugeosdeul-i neolo hayeogeum hananim-ui gil eseo beos-eonage hamae hananim-ui gil eseo banghwanghaneun jadeul-egeneun gyesanhaneun geunal-eul mang-gaghan iyulo museoun beol-i iss-eulila
